mapper.insert: insert into post (p_id, r_num, p_content, p_public) values (#{p_id}, #{r_num}, #{p_content}, #{p_public})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE p_public = #{p_public} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE p_id = #{p_id}
SELECT p.* FROM post p LEFT JOIN heart h ON p.p_num = h.h_num WHERE p.p_public = '공개' GROUP BY p.p_num ORDER BY COUNT(h.h_num) DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM POST WHERE p_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{p_content}, '%')
